title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message:
I tried to do nvram reset on this 820-2850-A and it will chime when I am doing those key sequence. However, subsequent bootup has no chime again. 

But sound works after boot into macos and volume up/down is also working.

What could be the cause of this?

title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message: Do you get sound on all speakers?

title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message: yes I do. any idea? possible bad spi?

title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message:
You can try to reflash BIOS.
But is so important the chime???

title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message: no but something is wrong right?

title: 820-2850-A no chime even after nvram reset, but sound works after bootup
message:
Test it, run a GPU bechmark.
If no issues, call it "repaired".

Change C9560, just in case.
